'''Shape Your World: Minecraft meets Art''' is a documentary released during the [[15 Days of Minecraft]] event.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.boo-agency.com/work/creativity-squared|title=Creativity Squared|website=Boo Agency}}</ref><ref>{{Mcnet|art-shaped-minecraft|Art shaped by Minecraft|May 26, 2024|Linn Viberg}}</ref> The video details five artists from across the world, who were enlisted to create different pieces of art about ''[[Minecraft]]''.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|boo_agency_|DBYlAQrMnHy|The incredible work of German graffiti artist Bond Truluv from our Shape Your World project earlier this year.<br><br>Minecraft is an incredible world, with every individual‚Äôs journey a unique one. But can it be used as a creative tool? üé®<br><br>We invited artists from around the world to inject Minecraft into their creative processes and as you can see, the results were simply stunning.|October 21, 2024}}</ref><ref>{{Cite Instagram|boo_agency_|DBd9QxTMmiT|Exploring the world of Minecraft as a new player inspired, Mexico-based artist, Filippo Giusti to combine his unique Essentialism style with mosaic for the first time.<br><br>What he ended up creating was beautiful, inspired and truly captured the endless possibilities those little blocks hold. üé®|October 23, 2024}}</ref>
